resources.string:
The Bluetooth button is used to connect this application to the spectrometer.
 The "Scan" button is used to go to the scan view. 
The "Problems" button is used to access to the saved problems. 
The "Spectrophotometer" button is used to show information about the device.

The "Device Status" button is used to show information about the status of the device like the battery, the temperature or the humidity. 
The "Device Information" button is used to show some characteristics about the device like the serial number, the model number or the hardware revision. 
The "Reset" button is used to reset the device 
These buttons only can be pressed if a stable connection exists.
The text show the correspondent information about the information of the device.
The text show the correspondent information about the status of the device.

The list is used to select a problem and see the correspondent saved scans.\nThe "+" button is used to add a new problem with the correspondent labels.\nFurthemore, by presing an item a long time, a dialog for delete the problem will appear.
The list is used to select a scan and see the correspondent data.\nFurthemore, by presing an item a long time, a dialog for delete the scan will appear.
The tabs are used to change into the different graphs.\n The "Predict" button is used to make a prediction about the graph.\n The "Edit Scan" button is used to edit the labels of the selected scan.

The tabs are used to change into the different graphs.
 The "Scan" button is used to perform a scan.
The "Predict" button is used to make a prediction about the graph.
The "Save Scan" button is used to save a problem with the correspondent labels.
The "Set Configuration" button is used to select a new configuration.
The list is used to select a new configuration. To see the correspondent configuration data, you must activate the configuration and a dialog will show the results.
